attributes.action: NO! To David Laws returning from Coventry.
attributes.additional_details: Active constituents of Yeovil, Somerset say no to the return to Cabinet of David Laws. He will not regain his seat in The West Country in 2015, will not represent the views of the voters and is not respected as an up-standing member of our society. To remove any doubt, this e-petition is only about his illegal expenses claim and writing the Coallition Agreement, nothing else is relevant!
